data.actual_result: Invite box shows an empty server icon and a join server button for a few seconds before switching to expired invite link. Also, the text at the left/top shows up after.
data.expected_result: Page shouldn't fully load and have nothing show up.
data.short_description: Invites saying they are expired on Android Chrome. BUG BOUNTY.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on an invite link. - Have your internet connection disconnect for a few seconds while loading the page. - Look at the invite box.
